verses.name: Leviticus 11:40
verses.text: And he that eateth of the carcase of it shall wash his clothes, and be unclean until the even: he also that beareth the carcase of it shall wash his clothes, and be unclean until the even.

verses.name: Leviticus 11:41
verses.text: And every creeping thing that creepeth upon the earth shall be an abomination; it shall not be eaten.

verses.name: Leviticus 11:42
verses.text: Whatsoever goeth upon the belly, and whatsoever goeth upon all four, or whatsoever hath more feet among all creeping things that creep upon the earth, them ye shall not eat; for they are an abomination.
